channel.description: Recent content in web-audio Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with web-audio
item.description: Synthesising audio # Using effects on audio # Recording audio from a microphone source # Playing audio # Realtime altering of two audio sources # Setup # We start off by creating an audio context and then create an oscillator which is the easiest way to check that your setup works. (Example fiddle) // We can either use the standard AudioContext or the webkitAudioContext (Safari) var audioContext = (window.AudioContext || window.
